KJV Bible Store

Welcome to KJV Bibles, your online Bible store for high-quality, beautifully designed King James Bibles and Bible covers, including large print Bibles, family Bibles, giant print Bibles, pocket Bibles and thinline Bibles as well as a variety of KJV journaling Bibles. Browse our extensive selection of Bible covers, KJV Bible accessories, bible coloring books, devotional journals, and inspirational gifts. Shop the KJV Bibles store with confidence, knowing that the King James Version of the Bible is still the most widely read Bible in the world.

About KJV Bible Store

Our Story
KJV Bibles online Bible store is a leading retailer of the King James Version of the Holy Bible, as well as Bible covers, journals and Christian gifts. We provide lovely KJV Bibles for sale, as well as practical Bible study supplies. We design and publish KJV Bibles exclusively and are the sellers of the top 7 bestselling versions of the King James. We’ve been in business for over 40 years and are committed to preserving this beautiful and venerated 400 year old text.
Learn More

Our King James Bibles
At KJV Bibles, every one of our Bibles features the timeless text of the Holy Bible in the beloved King James Version. Take a look at our diverse selection of KJV Bibles which includes large print Bibles, pocket Bibles and slimline Bibles – even pretty Bibles for women. We also carry giant print and super giant print options for those who need a larger typeface.

Many of our Bibles contain appendices such as concordances, footnote cross-reference guides, topical verse finders, full-color annotated biblical maps, and one-year Bible reading plans. With their elegantly-designed covers, our Bibles make excellent gifts.
View All Bibles

Bible Covers
Your KJV Bible is precious, so use a Bible cover to protect it! Our Bible covers for women and Bible covers for men elegantly combine polished style with practical function in a variety of designs, materials and colors. From Jeremiah 29:11 to "I can do all things through Christ," each Bible case has its own Christian inspiration woven into the design. Bible covers offer a decorative way not just to express personality, but to differentiate between Bibles, making an easy grab-and-go on a busy Sunday morning.
View All Covers

Devotional Journals
Our devotional journals combine with your KJV Bible for a deepened Bible Study experience. Choose from a spiral notebook style or a faux leather journal embossed with scriptural messages. Explore our unique and sophisticated cover designs featuring King James themes that carry over onto each page within. Record your prayers, thoughts and study insights for in-depth personal meditation and renewing your relationship with God.
View All Journals

Journaling Bibles
Take time out to be still and know with our new KJV Journaling Bibles. Combining a journal with the power of the Holy Bible, our new KJV Journaling Bibles offer extra wide margins for note taking and artwork. Beautifully decorated, with illustrations and verses inside to color and places to make your own art or take notes, these Bibles offer time to create prayerfully and meditatively.
Learn More

Journaling Supplies
Enhance your KJV journaling with our assortment of useful Bible journaling supplies. Modern note taking and journaling have moved beyond Bible highlighters. Our KJV Bibles store offers a range of colored, metallic and glitter gel pens, colored pencils, washi tape and stickers for creative journaling and illustrating. Use these supplies with one of our journals, coloring books, or one of our KJV Journaling Bibles.
Learn More

Christian Gifts
We offer Christian gifts that are as exciting to give as they are to receive. Our inspirational gift collections feature Bibles, Bible covers, keychains, mugs, water bottles and home decor. You’ll find unique gifts for special occasions such as birthdays, anniversaries, graduations, and weddings. Find gifts for men and gifts for women featuring biblical inspiration from the King James Version.
View All Gifts

Why KJV Bible Store?

"If you’re looking for journaling Bibles and supplies to go along with them, I trust you’ll find what you need at a price that will make you happy here."

Marcy Crabtree - Homeschool Mom, Blogger - Ben and Me

When I received...this KJV Bible in giant print...my first impression was of the impressive box, which treated the Bible as though it’s a gift – as the Word of God surely is.

Mary Sayler - Poet, Writer, Bible Reviewer

Over the years I've been asked if I knew of a good journaling Bible for the King James Version and I didn't have a good answer. I'm happy to tell you that now I do!

Krystal Whitten - Designer, Hand Lettering Artist

26 Bible verses about Christmas. Remind yourself of prophecy and the story of Jesus's birth, plus the eternal truth of this magnificent gift of God.

The King James Bible and the English Language

The KJV has been holding sway over our English language for years. We may or may not know the origins of many phrases, words and idioms we commonly use! Read this article to find out where the King James Version appears in everyday English.

35 More Bible Verses About Anxiety

35 more Bible verses about anxiety. Find hope and peace as you read these verses from the King James Version.

Bible Translation and the King James Bible

The integrity and poetry of the King James Version make it the most enduring translation of the Bible in history. The KJV Bible is considered a literary marvel, a work of art that has stood the test of time; revered as one of the best translations of the Holy Bible.

King James Bible Bestsellers For Father's Day

Dad needs care, too, and supernatural care at that.  Father's Day is the perfect time to show how much you care.  How about the eternal, life-changing word of God? “For the Word of God is quick and powerful….” Hebrews 4:12 (KJV).  Celebrate the eternal influence of your dad with a KJV Bible this Dad’s day.

Who Was King James and Why The King James Bible?

King James made a name for himself with the King James Bible.  A translator and scholar himself, he commissioned this new translation amidst political disagreement about church reform and authority.
